experience.title: Product Management
experience.description: Increased the adoption rate of a new product offering by 10% in a span of 3 months by identifying the blocker and transforming it into a Product Capability.Recommended Pricing for Data retention for an Inbound Parcel Tracking product thereby adding one more revenue stream worth of USD 125K MRR to the product.Reduced the number of emails by 50% and the time spent on handling escalation tickets by introducing a structured process in Sales and Services Enablement.Created one-stop internal Excel Dashboard for PM leadership team that tracks sales, P&L, and Product Performance.Collaborated closely with the Client Success team to extend the 300K USD worth contract of a client, US Navy by addressing their custom requirements.Owned and Managed Sales, Product and Financials Analytics Dashboard with Excel, Salesforce, and Power BI.
experience.description_html: Increased the adoption rate of a new product offering by 10% in a span of 3 months by identifying the blocker and transforming it into a Product Capability.Recommended Pricing for Data retention for an Inbound Parcel Tracking product thereby adding one more revenue stream worth of USD 125K MRR to the product.Reduced the number of emails by 50% and the time spent on handling escalation tickets by introducing a structured process in Sales and Services Enablement.Created one-stop internal Excel Dashboard for PM leadership team that tracks sales, P&L, and Product Performance.Collaborated closely with the Client Success team to extend the 300K USD worth contract of a client, US Navy by addressing their custom requirements.Owned and Managed Sales, Product and Financials Analytics Dashboard with Excel, Salesforce, and Power BI.

projects: [{"title":"No-code EDA","start_date":"Apr 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"No-code EDA is a semi automated web app that gets your EDA work done.Here you just drag and drop the data set file in our app and it will generate EDA for your dataset.You can save your major time by using our app for EDA.We built our app using streamlit package, which is very nice and easy to implement for ML applications. We initially included only limited EDA operations but in the future, we surely update to cover all EDA operations in our app."},{},{},{"title":"IHMS","start_date":"Mar 2021","end_date":"Mar 2021","description":"~Integrated Hospital Management SystemWorked on a Semi automated Hospital management web app that are used for managing database in Clinics and Mini hospitals.Involved in designing around 5 segments of this web app like registration, consultation, Scan Report, Pharmacy and Billing.Got to learn various technologies in Web development like HTML, CSS, JS, FirebaseUnderstood the importance of Skills such as Project Management, UI, Team management, Business acumen, etc.,"},{},{"title":"Microprocessor Challenge","start_date":"Oct 2020","end_date":"Jan 2021","description":"Worked independently on preparing a market research report that has insights about the Indian Defence Sector and its entire landscape.Learned the skill of Quantitative analysis and Report writing with the statistical data gained through Secondary market research which is a kind of data collection using existing resources.Came to an understanding of the jargons like TAM,SAM,SOM."}]
